summary: Frontend-only testing completed for embeddable booking widget system. Landing page and UI design are excellent, but admin authentication and booking widget interactions need fixes.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 404 'Service not found' when querying available slots
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks booking widget from showing available times

ui_bugs.issue: Login form accepts demo credentials but doesn't navigate to dashboard
ui_bugs.selector: Login page stays at /admin/login after successful credentials
ui_bugs.details: Authentication appears to succeed (API returns 200) but routing/state management fails

integration_issues.issue: Elements not stable for clicking - timeout errors on service selection
integration_issues.details: Likely due to animations or loading states preventing stable clicks

passed_tests: Landing page hero section loads with beautiful design
Landing page features section displays (4 feature cards with hover effects)
Landing page testimonials section displays (3 testimonial cards)
Navigation links work (Features, How it Works, Testimonials)
Hero CTA buttons work ('Start Free Trial', 'See it in action')
Booking widget loads and displays services (Demo Salon)
Widget shows 4 services: Consultation ($75), Haircut ($35), Express Trim ($20), Test Service ($50)
Mobile responsive design works perfectly (390x844 viewport)
Tablet responsive design works correctly (768x1024 viewport)
Frontend loads successfully from public URL
Backend API: POST /api/admin/login works (200 OK with demo credentials)
Backend API: GET /api/businesses/{id} works (200 OK, returns 4 services)
Progress indicator shows in booking widget
Widget design is modern and polished
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Fix admin login routing - authentication succeeds but dashboard navigation fails. 2. Fix slots API endpoint returning 404 for valid service IDs. 3. Resolve booking widget element stability issues preventing clicks. 4. Test complete booking flow once above issues are resolved.
